summary: A comprehensive test suite for the Terraform parsing library, covering HCL2 loading, module utilities, internal parser behavior, file versus directory handling, variable block processing, and plan file interpretation, with emphasis on edge‑case syntax, malformed inputs, encoding issues, timeouts, and duplicate or nested module detection.
business_intent: Guarantee accurate and robust parsing of Terraform configurations and plans to support reliable infrastructure‑as‑code automation, compliance checks, and CI/CD pipelines.
